title: Create a Video Package from an Interview
description: A video journalist has a 30-minute interview and needs to edit it down to a 2-minute video package for the web, adding B-roll and graphics.

tasks.description: Log the interview footage, identifying the most compelling soundbites.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a list of timestamps for the best quotes.

tasks.description: Assemble a rough cut of the selected soundbites to form a coherent narrative.
tasks.expected_outcome: A preliminary video sequence is created.

tasks.description: Overlay relevant B-roll footage to cover jump cuts and add visual context.
tasks.expected_outcome: The video flows smoothly and is visually engaging.

tasks.description: Add lower-third graphics to identify the speaker and a title card at the beginning.
tasks.expected_outcome: The video has professional-looking titles and graphics.
